Properties.ProtectedString:
-- SolarCrane
-- Waits for parent.child to exist, then returns it local function WaitForChild(parent, childName) assert(parent, "ERROR: WaitForChild: parent is nil") --print("waiting for:" , childName) while not parent:FindFirstChild(childName) do parent.ChildAdded:wait() end --print("Got:", childName) return parent[childName] end
--local tool = Game.Selection:Get()[1]; tool.Grip = CFrame.new(0,-2.3,0) * CFrame.Angles(0, math.pi/2, 0)
local DebrisService = Game:GetService('Debris') local PlayersService = Game:GetService('Players') local contentProvider = game:GetService("ContentProvider") local InsertService = Game:GetService("InsertService")
local Tool = script.Parent local Handle = WaitForChild(Tool, 'Handle')
local AnimationScript local StartAnim local StopAnim
-- Switch this to insertservice at some point local RatPrefab = InsertService:LoadAsset(106690606):GetChildren()[1] --WaitForChild(Game.Lighting, 'Rat') local RatController = WaitForChild(script, 'RatController')
local MyMouse local MyTorso local MyHumanoid local MyPlayer local MyCharacter
local Claw = WaitForChild(Tool, 'Claw') local OrbWeld = WaitForChild(Claw, 'ManualWeld') local ClawMotor = WaitForChild(Handle, 'Motor6D') local Orb = WaitForChild(Tool, 'Orb') local Sparkles = WaitForChild(Orb, 'Sparkles')
local SummonSounds = {WaitForChild(Handle, 'Summon1'), WaitForChild(Handle, 'Summon2'), WaitForChild(Handle, 'Summon3')}
local COOLDOWN_TIME = 4
local Rats = {}
local RATS_PER_SUMMON = 5 local MAX_RATS_OUT = 13
local rate=1/30
local BASE_URL = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=' --contentProvider.BaseUrl
local StaffMesh = '106677074' local OrbMesh = '106677090' local ClawMesh = '106677103'
local CreatorTag
function ApplyTag(target) while target:FindFirstChild('creator') do target.creator:Destroy() end CreatorTag:Clone().Parent = target end
function FindCharacter(part) if part.Parent == nil or part == Workspace then return nil end if part:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') then return part end return FindCharacter(part.Parent) end
function StartGuiRecharge() if PlayerGui and PlayerGui:FindFirstChild('Bar') and PlayerGui.Bar:FindFirstChild('Backing') and PlayerGui.Bar:FindFirstChild('Fill') and PlayerGui:FindFirstChild('RechargeText') then PlayerGui.RechargeText.Text = "Recharging..." local timeRemaining = math.min(COOLDOWN_TIME, tick() - LastUse) print('Start Size = ', timeRemaining / COOLDOWN_TIME) PlayerGui.Bar.Fill.Size = UDim2.new(timeRemaining / SWING_TIME, 0, 1, 0) PlayerGui.Bar.Fill:TweenSize(UDim2.new(1,0,1,0), "Out", "Linear", SWING_TIME - timeRemaining, false, function() if PlayerGui then PlayerGui.RechargeText.Text = "Ready" end end) end end
local Attacking = false function OnActivated() local hitPos = MyMouse.Hit if (Attacking or MyHumanoid.Health <= 0) or not MyCharacter:FindFirstChild('Right Arm') then return end Attacking = true Tool.Enabled = false if ClawMotor then ClawMotor.MaxVelocity = 0.3 end Spawn(function() for i = 1, 10 do wait() if OrbWeld then OrbWeld.C0 = OrbWeld.C0 + Vector3.new(0,.1,0) end end end) if Sparkles then Sparkles.Enabled = true end StartAnim:Invoke('AttackAnim') SummonSounds[math.random(1,#SummonSounds)]:Play() local sortedRatList = {} for rat, creationTime in pairs(Rats) do if (rat == nil) or (rat:FindFirstChild('Torso') == nil) or (rat:FindFirstChild('Head') == nil) then Rats[rat] = nil rat:Destroy() else table.insert(sortedRatList, rat) end end table.sort(sortedRatList, function(a, b) return Rats[a] < Rats[b] end)
local numRatsToDestroy = math.max(0, (#sortedRatList + RATS_PER_SUMMON) - MAX_RATS_OUT)
--print("Num of sorted rats: ", #sortedRatList , " num of rats to destroy: " , numRatsToDestroy)
for i = 1, numRatsToDestroy do local deadRat = sortedRatList[i] if deadRat and Rats[deadRat] then --print("Deleting rat at"..i..": " , deadRat.Name) deadRat:Destroy() Rats[deadRat] = nil end end
for i = 1, RATS_PER_SUMMON do if RatPrefab then local newRat = RatPrefab:Clone() local newController = RatController:Clone() ApplyTag(newController) newController.Parent = newRat newController.Disabled = false Rats[newRat] = tick() WaitForChild(newRat, 'Torso') -- Might want to do a better method of finding free areas. newRat.Torso.CFrame = hitPos + CFrame.Angles(0, math.random() * math.pi * 2, 0) * Vector3.new(i + math.random(),5, i + math.random()) newRat.Torso.CFrame = newRat.Torso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, math.random() * math.pi * 2, 0) newRat.Parent = Workspace end end
wait(COOLDOWN_TIME) for i = 1, 10 do wait() if OrbWeld then OrbWeld.C0 = OrbWeld.C0 - Vector3.new(0,.1,0) end end if Sparkles then Sparkles.Enabled = false end if ClawMotor then ClawMotor.MaxVelocity = 0.1 end Tool.Enabled = true Attacking = false end
local Equipping = false function OnEquipped(mouse) print("Getting new mouse") MyMouse = mouse if Equipping then return end Equipping = true ClawMotor.CurrentAngle = 0 ClawMotor.DesiredAngle = 1000000 ClawMotor.MaxVelocity = 0.1 MyCharacter = Tool.Parent MyPlayer = PlayersService:GetPlayerFromCharacter(MyCharacter) MyTorso = MyCharacter:FindFirstChild('Torso') MyHumanoid = MyCharacter:FindFirstChild('Humanoid')
CreatorTag = Instance.new('ObjectValue') CreatorTag.Name = 'creator' --NOTE: Must be called 'creator' for website stats CreatorTag.Value = MyPlayer
AnimationScript = WaitForChild(Tool,'AnimationScript') StartAnim = WaitForChild(AnimationScript, 'Start') StopAnim = WaitForChild(AnimationScript, 'Stop') wait(0.5) if Tool:IsDescendantOf(Workspace) then StartAnim:Invoke('IdleAnim', 0.5) end Equipping = false end
local UnEquipping = false function OnUnequipped() if UnEquipping then return end UnEquipping = true if PlayerGui then PlayerGui:Destroy() PlayerGui = nil end for rat, _ in pairs(Rats) do rat:Destroy() end Sparkles.Enabled = false UnEquipping = false end
Tool.Activated:connect(OnActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(OnUnequipped)

-- Waits for parent.child to exist, then returns it local function WaitForChild(parent, childName) assert(parent, "ERROR: WaitForChild: parent is nil") while not parent:FindFirstChild(childName) do parent.ChildAdded:wait() end return parent[childName] end
local PlayersService = Game:GetService('Players') local DebrisService = Game:GetService('Debris') local RAT_LIFESPAN = 20 local RAT_DAMAGE = 8 local MyCreator = WaitForChild(script, 'creator') local MyTorso = WaitForChild(script.Parent, 'Torso') local MyHead = WaitForChild(script.Parent, 'Head') local MyHumanoid = WaitForChild(script.Parent, 'Humanoid') local Smoke = WaitForChild(MyTorso, 'Smoke')
DebrisService:AddItem(script.Parent, RAT_LIFESPAN)
local HitCharacters = {} local Characters = {}
function RayIgnoreCheck(hit, pos) if hit then if hit.Transparency >= 1 or string.lower(hit.Name) == "water" or hit.Name == "Effect" or hit.Name == "Rocket" or hit.Name == "Bullet" or hit.Name == "Rat" or hit.Name == "Handle" or hit:IsDescendantOf(MyCharacter) then return true end end return false end
-- @preconditions: vec should be a unit vector, and 0 < rayLength <= 1000 function RayCast(startPos, vec, rayLength) local hitObject, hitPos = game.Workspace:FindPartOnRay(Ray.new(startPos + (vec * .01), vec * rayLength), Handle) if hitObject and hitPos then local distance = rayLength - (hitPos - startPos).magnitude if RayIgnoreCheck(hitObject, hitPos) and distance > 0 then -- there is a chance here for potential infinite recursion return RayCast(hitPos, vec, distance) end end return hitObject, hitPos end
function FindCharacter(part) if part.Parent == nil or part == Workspace then return nil end if part:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') then return part end return FindCharacter(part.Parent) end
function FindCharactersInWorkspace() for _, child in pairs(Game.Workspace:GetChildren()) do if child:IsA('Model') and child.Name ~= 'Rat' then if child:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') then Characters[child] = true end end end -- Remove my creator from the possible target list if MyCreator and MyCreator.Value and MyCreator.Value.Character then Characters[MyCreator.Value.Character] = nil end end
function CheckForJump() local hitObj, hitPos = RayCast(MyTorso.CFrame.p, MyHead.CFrame.lookVector, 10) if hitObj then MyHumanoid.Jump = true end end
function OnHit(hit) if MyHumanoid and MyHumanoid.Health > 0 then
MyHumanoid.Jump = true local character = FindCharacter(hit) if character and not HitCharacters[character] and PlayersService:GetPlayerFromCharacter(character) ~= MyCreator.Value and character.Name ~= 'Rat' then local hitHumanoid = character:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') if hitHumanoid then MyHumanoid.Jump = true HitCharacters[character] = true hitHumanoid:TakeDamage(RAT_DAMAGE) end end end end
MyHead.Touched:connect(OnHit)
Workspace.ChildAdded:connect(function(child) if child:IsA('Model') and child.Name ~= 'Rat' and child:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') then Characters[child] = true end end)
FindCharactersInWorkspace()
MyTorso.Transparency = 1
Smoke.Enabled = false wait() Smoke.Enabled = true wait(1) Smoke.Enabled = false MyTorso.Transparency = 0
Delay(RAT_LIFESPAN - 4, function() if Smoke then Smoke.RiseVelocity = 12 Smoke.Enabled = true end wait(1.4) if Smoke then Smoke.Enabled = false end if MyTorso then MyTorso.Transparency = 1 end end)
Spawn(function() while true do wait(3) HitCharacters = {} end end)
--[[ Spawn(function () while true do wait(0.15) CheckForJump() end end) --]]
while true do local closestTarget = nil local closestDist = 100000000 for target, _ in pairs(Characters) do if (target:FindFirstChild('Torso') and target:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') and target:FindFirstChild('Humanoid').Health > 0 and ((target.Torso.CFrame.p - MyTorso.CFrame.p).magnitude < closestDist)) then closestDist = (target.Torso.CFrame.p - MyTorso.CFrame.p).magnitude closestTarget = target end end if closestTarget then local targetTorso = closestTarget:FindFirstChild('Torso') if targetTorso then --print("Attacking " , closestTarget.Name) MyHumanoid:MoveTo(targetTorso.CFrame.p, targetTorso) end end wait(.5) end

-- Waits for the child of the specified parent local function WaitForChild(parent, childName) while not parent:FindFirstChild(childName) do parent.ChildAdded:wait() end return parent[childName] end
local Tool = script.Parent
local Animations = {} local MyHumanoid local MyCharacter
local StartAnim = WaitForChild(script, 'Start') local StopAnim = WaitForChild(script, 'Stop')
function PlayAnimation(animationName, speed) speed = speed or 1 if Animations[animationName] then Animations[animationName]:Play(0.1, 1, speed) else print("Can't find animation:" , animationName) end end
function StopAnimation(animationName) if Animations[animationName] then Animations[animationName]:Stop() end end
function ConnectAnimationToValueChange(valueName, animationName) return WaitForChild(Tool, valueName).Changed:connect( function (value) PlayAnimation(animationName) end) end
function LoadAnimation(animationObject) if MyHumanoid then Animations[animationObject.Name] = MyHumanoid:LoadAnimation(animationObject) else print("Tried to load an anim without a humanoid") end end
function OnEquipped(mouse) MyCharacter = Tool.Parent MyHumanoid = WaitForChild(MyCharacter, 'Humanoid')
Tool.ChildAdded:connect(function (child) if child:IsA('Animation') then LoadAnimation(animationObject) end end) for _, child in pairs(Tool:GetChildren()) do if child:IsA('Animation') then LoadAnimation(child) end end end
function OnUnequipped() for name, animTrack in pairs(Animations) do StopAnimation(name); end end
StartAnim.OnInvoke = PlayAnimation StopAnim.OnInvoke = StopAnimation
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(OnUnequipped)

local MOUSE_ICON = 'rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png' local RELOADING_ICON = 'rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png'
local Tool = script.Parent
local Mouse = nil
local function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and MOUSE_ICON or RELOADING_ICON end end
local function OnEquipped(mouse) Mouse = mouse UpdateIcon() end
local function OnChanged(property) if property == 'Enabled' then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)
